participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and community-oriented, Emily thrives on helping others and values her connections with animals.
participant_1.background: I love to volunteer at my local animal shelter to get hands-on experience with animals and learn more about veterinary medicine. My biggest challenge was when I was in the military and had to be away from my family for long periods of time. I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic. I am an adult who exercises every day to keep my heart and lungs healthy. My favorite websites are the ones that help me learn about medicine and dust allergies.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Creative and motivated, Jason enjoys expressing himself through music and home improvement projects.
participant_2.background: I'm relatively new to the workforce, but I've been at my current job for a few months now. My parents are great, but they don't understand my lifestyle. I spent my last birthday building a new deck for my house. I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others. I grew up with them, and we've been close ever since.

content.text: Hey, what do you like to do for fun?
I spend a lot of time with my piano. I love that I can express myself creatively and connect with others.
I love that! I'm not musical at all but I love to listen to music. Do you write your own music?
I don't write my own music, but I would love to learn how one day. I just enjoy playing for people and seeing their reactions.
That's great. I'm sure you're very talented! What else do you enjoy doing?
I love working on home improvement projects. I built a new deck for my house last birthday.
That's awesome! I'm not very handy so I'm always impressed by people who can do things like that.
It's not too hard, you just have to be willing to learn and try new things.
I think I'll stick to volunteering at my local animal shelter. I love getting hands-on experience with animals.
That's great! I'm sure the animals love you there.
I hope so! I try to make sure they have a good time.
I'm sure you do. You seem like a very caring person.
Thank you! I try my best.
I'm sure you do. It's been nice talking to you.
You too! It's been nice getting to know you.
